comments.content: I’d be interested in knowing what this font is too. It’s similiar to [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704150853/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html).

Thanks guys, it’s a stunner for me anyway.

On the Christmas list!
